channel.title: Comments on: Language feature is better than OS

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I think I need to spend more time on reading Ada documentation so to know more packages that can be used, after all programming is just put those functions together.
item.content:encoded: I think I need to spend more time on reading Ada documentation so to know more packages that can be used, after all programming is just put those functions together.

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Turned out I should not even use GetCommandLine, as it behaves differently when starting from command line or double click in explorer.
I changed to use Ada.Command_Line.Command_Name then everything's working fine now.
item.content:encoded:
Turned out I should not even use GetCommandLine, as it behaves differently when starting from command line or double click in explorer.

I changed to use Ada.Command_Line.Command_Name then everything’s working fine now.
